binding:binding.name: Honeywell Thermostat Binding
binding:binding.description: Controls Honeywell Thermostats from openHAB. Requires internet connection and Honeywell account. Tested with Honeywell TH9320WF5003 US Model, but other models that use the mytotalcomfort.com site may be supported.
binding:binding.author: Jeremy Freedman and Rendman
